def is_remote_control_for_dvd(remote:item):
    # Check if the remote is the one for the DVD player
    symbol is_dvd_remote=exists player: item : is_dvd_player(player) and close(remote, player)
    return is_dvd_remote

behavior observe_unvisited_remotes():
    body:
        foreach remote: item:
            if is_remote_control(remote) and not visited(remote):
                observe(remote, "Check if this is the remote for the DVD player")

behavior __goal__():

            bind remote: item where:
                is_remote_control(remote) and is_remote_control_for_dvd(remote)
            achieve close_char(char, remote)
        
        else:
            observe_unvisited_remotes()

    symbol is_correct=exists dvd_player: item : is_dvd_player(dvd_player) and is_remote_control(rem)
    return is_correct

behavior turn_on_dvd_player_with_remote(remote:item):
